4.text: Suganya is Absent Today Teacher : Where's Suganya? Is she absent today?
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='suganja'>Suganya</phoneme> is Absent Today Teacher : Where's <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='suganja'>Suganya</phoneme>? Is she absent today?</prosody></speak>

5.text: Mufeeda : Yes, teacher. She's not well.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='mufiːda'>Mufeeda</phoneme> : Yes, teacher. She's not well.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Teacher : That's too bad. What's the matter with her?
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Teacher : That's too bad. What's the matter with her?</prosody></speak>

7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='mufiːda'>Mufeeda</phoneme>: She had food poisoning.</prosody></speak>

8.text: Teacher : Oh dear! You should be very careful about what you eat and drink. Stale or contaminated food and unpasteurized milk can make you sick. Nisal : We should also drink clean water.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Teacher : Oh dear! You should be very careful about what you eat and drink. Stale or contaminated food and unpasteurized milk can make you sick. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nisal'>Nisal</phoneme> : We should also drink clean water.</prosody></speak>

9.text: Teacher : Yes, Nisal. That's very important. Children, would you like to make a Get Well card for Suganya?
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Teacher : Yes, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nisal'>Nisal</phoneme>. That's very important. Children, would you like to make a Get Well card for <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='suganja'>Suganya</phoneme>?</prosody></speak>

10.text: Children: Yes, we would, teacher. We'll come a little early tomorrow and make one.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Children: Yes, we would, teacher. We'll come a little early tomorrow and make one.</prosody></speak>

11.text: Iromi and Surandi: Shall we go to see her, teacher?
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='iromi'>Iromi</phoneme> and <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='surandi'>Surandi</phoneme>: Shall we go to see her, teacher?</prosody></speak>

12.text: Teacher :Why not? We'll go to see her after school tomorrow. But remember, you must get permission from your parents.
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Teacher :Why not? We'll go to see her after school tomorrow. But remember, you must get permission from your parents.</prosody></speak>
